# CAM::POINT_CAM_AT_ENTITY

## Summary
Points the camera at an entity

## Parameters
* **CAMERA_INDEX** camera
* **ENTITY_INDEX** entity:
Index: The index of the entity to point the camera at.
vecOffset: An additional offset to be applied from the look-at position.
* **FLOAT** vecOffsetX
* **FLOAT** vecOffsetY
* **FLOAT** vecOffsetZ
* **BOOL** offsetIsRelative = true: If true, vecOffset is applied relative to the orientation of the entity being pointed at, rather than in world-space.

## Notes
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
p5 always seems to be 1 i.e TRUE
